Title: Export Content Calendar & Create Automation Checklist
Labels: automation,content

Summary:
Convert the 200-day content calendar in `CONTENT_AUTOMATION_SYSTEM.md` into a CSV/JSON for scheduler import and create an automation checklist for Mailchimp/OpenAI/n8n.

Checklist:
- [ ] Parse calendar and export CSV/JSON with columns: date,type,post_id,title,platform
- [ ] Create `tools/export_content_calendar.py` or JSON file for import
- [ ] Create automation checklist issue: Mailchimp RSS, OpenAI API key, n8n/Zapier flows, scheduling tool
